mapper.select: SELECT def_store.id, store_id, store_code, store_name, brand_code, flg_tob, def_store.province, def_store.city, def_store.area, def_store.street, def_store.lng, def_store.lat, def_store.area_code, def_store.corp_code, def_store.modified_date, def_store.modifier, def_store.created_date, def_store.creater, def_store.isactive, def_corp.corp_name, def_store.logo FROM def_store,def_corp WHERE def_store.corp_code = def_corp.corp_code AND def_store.id=#{id}

select def_store.store_code, def_store.store_name, def_store.logo FROM def_store,def_corp WHERE def_store.corp_code = def_corp.corp_code AND def_store.corp_code = #{corp_code} AND def_store.isactive = 'Y' AND def_corp.isactive = 'Y' GROUP BY def_store.id ORDER BY def_store.id DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO def_store
store_code,
store_name,
brand_code,
area_code,
corp_code,
flg_tob,
province,
city,
area,
street,
modified_date,
modifier,
created_date,
creater,
isactive,
store_id,
lng,
lat,
logo,
#{store_code},
#{store_name},
#{brand_code},
#{area_code},
#{corp_code},
#{flg_tob},
#{province},
#{city},
#{area},
#{street},
#{modified_date},
#{modifier},
#{created_date},
#{creater},
#{isactive},
#{store_id},
#{lng},
#{lat},
#{logo},
mapper.update:
UPDATE def_store
store_code=#{store_code},
store_id=#{store_id},
store_name=#{store_name},
brand_code=#{brand_code},
area_code=#{area_code},
corp_code=#{corp_code},
flg_tob = #{flg_tob},
province = #{province},
city = #{city},
area = #{area},
street = #{street},
lng = #{lng},
lat = #{lat},
modified_date=#{modified_date},
modifier=#{modifier},
created_date=#{created_date},
creater=#{creater},
isactive=#{isactive},
logo=#{logo},
WHERE id=#{id};
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM def_store WHERE 1=1
AND created_date LIKE concat(#{created_date},'%')

SELECT def_store.id, store_code, store_name, province, city, area, street, def_store.area_code, def_store.brand_code, def_store.corp_code, def_store.lng, def_store.lat, def_store.logo FROM def_store,def_corp WHERE def_store.corp_code = def_corp.corp_code
AND def_store.corp_code = #{corp_code}
AND (province LIKE concat('%',#{search_value},'%') OR city LIKE concat('%',#{search_value},'%') OR area LIKE concat('%',#{search_value},'%') OR street LIKE concat('%',#{search_value},'%') OR concat(province,city,area,street) LIKE concat('%',#{search_value},'%') OR store_name LIKE concat('%',#{search_value},'%') )
AND def_store.isactive = 'Y' AND def_corp.isactive = 'Y' GROUP BY def_store.id ORDER BY def_store.province DESC, def_store.city DESC

SELECT def_store.id, store_code, store_name, province, city, area, street, def_store.area_code, def_store.brand_code, def_store.corp_code, def_store.lng, def_store.lat, def_store.logo, (st_distance (point (lng, lat),point(#{lng},#{lat}) ) *111195) AS distance FROM def_store,def_corp WHERE def_store.corp_code = def_corp.corp_code AND def_store.corp_code = #{corp_code} AND def_store.lng IS NOT NULL AND def_store.lng != '' AND def_store.lat IS NOT NULL AND def_store.lat != '' AND def_store.isactive = 'Y' AND def_corp.isactive = 'Y' GROUP BY def_store.id HAVING distance < #{distance} ORDER BY distance
